favourite.article: Amen! What more can we say except Hallelujah!
Hallelujah. We were redeemed by God to become His kingdom of priests! He has purchased us not with silver or gold, but with His own precious blood! Saints, what a privilege to us!
This is the glory for which He asks to be obedient and tell every tribe, tongue and nation. May we be faithful, as He is forever faithful.
Thank You Lord, for the opportunity to be trained with 93 and more God-men under the ministry of the age! May we be ones who sing a new song by living in Your economy in reality day by day.
Praise the Lord we are labouring priests!
